Interface IActionDevice

All Superinterfaces:

All Known Subinterfaces:
ICamera, IFlash, IValve
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractActionDevice, Camera, Flash, Valve
public interface IActionDevice
extends IDevice

Base interface for all action devices that can be used in droplet.

Author:
Stefan Brenner
